title: Mizuki Shigeru Youkai Collection
original_name: 水木しげる妖怪コレクション
sinopse:
Collected together for the first time, this Manga boasts all 14 One Shot stories that Mizuki Shigeru drew between 1964-1974.

Until now, each One Shot was long considered impossible to find and were very much sought after on the used comic circuit.

The title of each one shot and its publication date are as follows:

1. Yoka Alaune (妖花アラウネ) (04-01-1968)
2. Genshi-san (原始さん) (10-??-1969)
3. Fuku no Kami (副の神) (12-??-1965)
4. Kaze no Kami (風の神) (07-??-1966)
5. Yosei (妖精) (06-??-1966)
6. Kage Onna (かげおんな) (08-30-1974)
7. Ame Onna (雨女) (03-07-1968)
8. Nekonin (ねこ忍) (12-??-1964)
9. Kappa (河童) (01-30-1965)
10. Kappa-Kou (河童膏) (06-05-1969)
11. Torikago (鳥かご) (01-??-1966)
12. Yomi no Kuni - saisho no kome (よみのくに - 最初の米)(11-05-1967)
13. Kage Onna (影女) (02-17-1968)
14. Gunshuu no naka ni (群衆の中に) (01-??-1970)
